text: Headlines: The UK has just approved a #Covid19 #vaccine - the first Western nation to formally do so. The vaccine, produced by #Pfizer and #BioNTech, will need to be stored at ultra-cold temperatures. KPFA & @FreeSpeechTV (3 pm PT), KPFK (4 pm PT), https://t.co/36KL8tuYa9 https://t.co/QObOKKZYO2
